p: Diet plays a huge role in disease prevention. During seasonal colds, it should be rich in vitamins and antioxidants. Key dietary components, such as vitamins C, D, E, zinc, selenium and polyunsaturated fatty acids, have an immunomodulatory effect. Recent studies have shown that dietary supplements can have beneficial effects, potentially decreasing the viral load of SARS-CoV-2 and reducing the recovery period in patients with COVID-19 [ 107, 141].
